DOC.brief_summary: Antibiotic eye drop use intravitreal injection . Currently study indicate benefit usage dosage . In study compare efficacy Vigamox eye drop ( antibiotic ) start 3 day prior injection versus 1 day prior intravitreal injection .
DOC.brief_title: Dosage Study Vigamox Eye Drops Prior Intravitreal Injections
DOC.criteria: Patient need intravitreal injection patient willing participate study Patients allergic Vigamox take eye drop within past 3 week
DOC.keyword: Vigamox , topical antibiotic , Intravitreal injection , macular degeneration , endophthalmitis
